mapper.select: SELECT id, logo, name, described, assort FROM Stack LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}

SELECT rs.related_stack AS relatedStack, rs.related_stack_logo AS relatedStackLogo, rs.stack_name_id AS stackNameId FROM Related_Stack rs
WHERE rs.stack_name_id IN
#{id}
WHERE 1 = 0
SELECT id, logo, name, described, assort FROM Stack WHERE assort LIKE CONCAT('%', #{assort}, '%') ORDER BY id LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Stack WHERE assort LIKE CONCAT('%', #{assort}, '%')
SELECT id, logo, name, described, assort FROM Stack WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') ORDER BY id LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Company WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
SELECT name FROM Stack WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') LIMIT 10
SELECT id, name, logo, assort, described FROM Stack WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT c.id, c.name, c.logo, cs.stack_id FROM Company c JOIN Company_Stack cs ON c.id = cs.company_id WHERE cs.stack_id = #{stackId}

SELECT c.id, c.img_url AS imgUrl, c.url, c.title, c.teacher, c.score, c.price, cs.stack_id FROM Course c JOIN Course_Stack cs ON c.id = cs.course_id WHERE cs.stack_id = #{stackId} ORDER BY c.`rank` LIMIT 5
